docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 👋 Hi, I'm Felipe Valboeno!
docs.text: I'm a Java developer focused on Spring Boot applications, RESTful APIs, and database integration. I'm passionate about learning new technologies and solving problems with clean and well-structured code.

docs.title: 🚀 Technologies I use
docs.text:
• Java | Spring Boot | JPA | Hibernate
  • JavaScript | Node.js | React (if used)
  • Git | GitHub | GitLab
  • SQL | MySQL | PostgreSQL
  • BPMN and ERPs

docs.title: 📌 Featured Projects
docs.text:
• SpringBoot Project: Practice project using SpringBoot and JPA/Hibernate with H2 database.
  • Product API: Full CRUD using SpringBoot, great for beginners.

docs.title: 🏢 Companies I've worked at
docs.text:
• Paschoalotto – MIS Intern
  • Stone Co. Linx – Support Analyst
  • Lecom Tecnologia – Developer

docs.title: 🎯 Personal interests
docs.text:
• 📚 Reading (productivity, self-development. Favorite author: Dan Brown)
  • 🎧 Listening to rock or relaxing sounds
  • ⚽ Walks with my wife and our dogs
  • 🎮 Playing PS5

I believe that balancing personal and professional life is essential for a sustainable and creative career.
